amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 118-4 to insert into Sec. 2 (a) line 10 "or" after "inflations and Strikes Sec.(a) lines 11-14. To clarify and make consistent with economic policy on inflationary impacts and effects.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to insert into Sec. 2 (a) line 10 "or" after "inflation" and strikes Sec. (a) lines 11-14. Also, the amendment sought to clarify and make consistent with economic policy on inflationary impacts and effects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 236 (Roll no. 127).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 236 (Roll no. 127).
